Description: Fragment of amygdaloid handle from a Thasian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine, highly micaceous, orange. Rectangular stamp at top of handle with Greek inscription and quiver and bow symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Herakleitos. Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 55, 38. For the date see Ch. Tzochev, Archaeologia Bulgarica 13 (2009) 65.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0018)
